translations: n.局限性；（限制）因素；边界（limitation 的复数形式）

phrs.translation: 限制基金；处理船主责任范围以外的索赔的基金

sentences.sentence: This technique is useful but it has its limitations.
sentences.translation: 这种技术实用，但也有局限性。

sentences.sentence: He knows his limitations as a writer.
sentences.translation: 他知道自己作为一个作家的局限性。

sentences.sentence: "I felt powerful because I broke through my own limitations," she recalls.
sentences.translation: 她回忆道：“我觉得自己很强大，因为我突破了自己的局限。”
